name: Website: cleaner - Punto-informatico.it
description:
Punto-informatico.it
Pi-telefonia.it
Pi-forum.it
Pi-download.it
Remove ads and unusefull stuff!
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document 
domain(pitelefonia.it),
domain(piforum.it),
domain(pidownload.it),
domain(punto-informatico.it)
{ 
[href*="http://ad.punto-informatico.it/"],
[src*="http://ad.punto-informatico.it/"],
[href*=".doubleclick.net"],
[src*=".doubleclick.net"],
[href*="http://adv.shinystat.it/"],
[src*="http://adv.shinystat.it/"],
[href*=".serving-sys.com/"],
[src*=".serving-sys.com/"],
[href*=".2mdn.net"],
[src*=".2mdn.net"],
[href*="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/"],
[src*="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/"],
table [width="230"],
.iframe,
.superbanner,
.topright, 
#footer,
#ads,
#adv234,
#adv728,
#att,
#aub,
#aus,
#aw0,
#aw1,
#tab,
#taw0,
#taw1,
#banner1,
#FLASH_AD, 
[alt*="Clicca qui"],
[alt*="Click here"]
{display: none !important }
}
